text: Yevgeny Fomin (; ; born 14 May 1994) is a Belarusian professional footballer. As of 2018, he plays for Sputnik Rechitsa.Player's profile at Pressball ==References== ==External links== * * Profile at FC Gomel website Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Gomel players Category:FC Osipovichi players Category:FC Smorgon players Category:FC Sputnik Rechitsa players
title: Yevgeny Fomin
